articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Who is Zakhar Prilepin, target of car bomb in Russia? - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Novelist and politician has been sanctioned by European nations for his ardent support of Russia’s war in Ukraine.
articles.content:
Zakhar Prilepin, who was wounded in a car blast in Russia that killed his driver, is the third prominent prowar figure to be targeted by a bomb since Moscows invasion of Ukraine in February 2022.

articles.title: Wagner chief to Moscow: Swap in Chechens in Bakhmut - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Russian mercenary leader has threatened to pull out of battle for the besieged Ukrainian city.
articles.content:
Chechen units should relieve the Wagner forces in the battle for the fiercely contested Ukrainian city of Bakhmut, the head of the Russian paramilitary group urged Moscow on Saturday.
